doc.field: Herley Microwave Systems Inc said it won a series of contract additions and new awards worth 7.7 mln dlrs. It said the contracts were from the U.S. Navy and Airforce, Martin Marietta Corp ML>, and Northrop Corp NOC>. The orders are scheduled to be delivered in 1987 and early 1988. The company said its Jan 31 backlog was 20 mln dlrs against 21 mln dlrs a year ago. Reuter
